name: Coloring Dash
description:
Dynamic way - challenge for any gamer. One touch control and lots of fun!

Just touch the screen to survive. Do not trust - it's not so simple here. You really have to survive in this dynamic and interesting platformer!

Prepare your fingers for the challenge, and yourself for a crazy fun. Coloring Dash pump your skills and your nerves. Jump, fly, lose, but do everything to go through all the levels! Or have we tried in vain?

Game features

  • Dynamic platformer causes a fun syndrome!
  • Take your skills and prove that you are the best in 2D platformers!
  • Your eyes will be happy with this beautiful old school graphics!
  • Improve statistics and get achievements!
  • See various and memorable levels!
  • All this and more in Coloring Dash!

Version: 0.87

We are always open for communication: falserate@yandex.ru
